pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# DecentralizedRoutinesDecentralized routines orquestration through Kinesis working pool ### create virtual environment
  • enter command: pip -m venv venv
  • activate virtual environnment (venv\Scripts\activate.bat)
## Create .env file in root folder Ie:
  • LOG_LEVEL=[DEBUG]
  • GIT_USER=[GIT_USER]
  • GIT_TOKEN=[GIT_TOKEN]
  • GIT_ACRONYM=[GIT_ACRONYM]
  • GIT_SERVER=[GIT_SERVER]
  • SOURCE_FOLDER=[SOURCE_FOLDER]
